mapper.select: SELECT comments.id, comments.dynamic_id, comments.user_id, comments.content, comments.location, comments.pid, comments.time, comments.puser_id, su.username, su.name, su.avatar, psu.name as 'pUserName' FROM comments LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON comments.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_user psu ON comments.puser_id = psu.id WHERE comments.dynamic_id = #{dynamicId}

SELECT comments.id, comments.dynamic_id, comments.user_id, comments.content, comments.location, comments.pid, comments.time, comments.puser_id, sys_user.username, sys_user.name, sys_user.avatar, d.name as dynamicName, d.content as dynamic_content FROM comments LEFT JOIN sys_user ON comments.user_id = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN dynamic d on d.id = comments.dynamic_id
d.name LIKE #{dynamicName} '%'
AND comments.deleted = 0 AND sys_user.deleted = 0 AND d.deleted = 0
